evidence_example.title: monostack_resource_demo
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal EE demo for the MONOSTACK case with the SofTec DEMO9S12XSFAME demo board.
evidence_example.long_descr:
Resource demo: A minimal EE demo for the MONOSTACK case with the SofTec DEMO9S12XSFAME demo board. The demo uses the following peripherals:
  • LEDs;
  • Buttons;
  • ADC module;
  • PIT timer;
  • SCI module;
